channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Iced pavemet by Wanstead Road bus stop travelling towards Bromley, 5th January
item.description:
The pavement is so iced over it is impossible to reach the bus stop. 269 Bus travelling along Widmore Road towards Bromly town hall, stopping at the Wanstead Road bus stop. Pavement is so iced over it is impossible to reach this bus stop. A lot of elderly people use this bus stop.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 133-135, Widmore Road, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Slippery road surface, 5th January
item.description:
Black ice on road next to school. Road needs gritting. Children go back to school tomorrow.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tillingbourne Green, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
